name: Mud Monster Up Hill Madness
description:
Offroad Driving requires huge amounts of skill and precision! Most people can’t cope with the demands of steering on offroads and usually very few take such challenges. Can you? Your aim is to park into the marked space with as little crashing as possible and complete all levels. Park in the glowing area marked with the Green. Don’t crash into anything! Aim for the fastest time with the least percentage damage! Once your damage gets to 100%, it’s game over.

-Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking Mud Monster

-Unique and smooth gameplay

-Exciting

-Different terrains/location

- EASY controls with only 2 buttons

- CRAZY jumps and loops

- Beautiful off-road terrains
